SELECT a.id AS "questionId", a.title, b.teacher_id AS "teacherId", b.teacher_name AS "teacherName", c.user_name AS "questionName", b.course_name AS "courseName", b.course_id AS "courseId", d.id AS "answerId", d.content AS "answerContent", d.create_time AS "answerTime", e.user_name AS "answerName", a.create_time, a.content, a.status FROM hotel_course_questions a LEFT JOIN hotel_course b ON a.course_id = b.course_id LEFT JOIN hotel_userdetail c ON c.user_id = a.student_id LEFT JOIN hotel_question_answers d ON d.question_id = a.id LEFT JOIN hotel_userdetail e ON e.user_id = d.teacher_id WHERE 1=1
AND b.teacher_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{teacherName},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND a.course_id = #{courseId}
ORDER BY b.course_id,a.create_time DESC

SELECT a.id AS "commentId", a.content AS "commentContent", a.create_time AS "commentTime", b.content AS "answerContent", c.user_name AS "commentName" FROM hotel_question_comment a, hotel_question_answers b, hotel_userdetail c WHERE a.answer_id = b.id AND a.user_id = c.user_id AND a.answer_id = #{answerId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT d.id AS "answerId", e.id AS "commentId", a.content AS "questionContent", d.content AS "answerContent", e.content AS "commentContent", a.title, b.teacher_name AS "teacherName", c.user_name AS "questionName", f.user_name AS "answerName", g.user_name AS "commentName", b.course_name, a.create_time AS "createTime", d.create_time AS "answerTime", e.create_time AS "commentTime", a.status FROM hotel_course_questions a LEFT JOIN hotel_course b ON a.course_id = b.course_id LEFT JOIN hotel_userdetail c ON c.user_id = a.student_id LEFT JOIN hotel_question_answers d ON d.question_id = a.id LEFT JOIN hotel_question_comment e ON e.answer_id = d.id LEFT JOIN hotel_userdetail f ON f.user_id = d.teacher_id LEFT JOIN hotel_userdetail g ON g.user_id = e.user_id WHERE a.id = #{questionId} ORDER BY d.id, d.create_time, e.create_time DESC

SELECT a.id AS "answerId", a.content AS "answerContent", a.create_time AS "answerTime", a.think_good, b.user_name AS "answerName" FROM hotel_question_answers a LEFT JOIN hotel_userdetail b ON a.teacher_id = b.user_id WHERE a.id=#{answerId}

SELECT a.id AS "answerId", b.user_name AS "answerName", a.question_id AS "questionId", a.create_time AS "answerTime", a.content AS "answerContent", c.title, a.attach_url, a.status FROM hotel_question_answers a LEFT JOIN hotel_userdetail b ON a.teacher_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN hotel_course_questions c ON c.id = a.question_id WHERE a.status = '1'
AND b.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{teacherName},'%')
AND c.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
